Group melee BRV attack + group HP attack
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
All targets: 4 turns 1 level of Stun (limit 5)

passives.name: Earthquake Extension
passives.desc:
When using Earthquake„ÄÅ Earthquake+:
 ‚Ä¢ Inflicts 4 turns DEF Down I

When using Earthquake:
 ‚Ä¢ BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 ‚Ä¢ Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 ‚Ä¢ Inflicted Stun level +1

When using Earthquake+:
 ‚Ä¢ BRV attack hit count becomes 3; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 ‚Ä¢ Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 200%

With active buffs:
 ‚Ä¢ BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage; Inflicts 4 turns 1 level of Stun [limit 5])
passives.short_desc: Earthquake Extension: Boost to Earthquake

passives.name: Debuffed Attack Boost Up
passives.desc: Moderately raises own MAX BRV„ÄÅ slightly raises own ATK while enemy is debuffed
passives.short_desc: Debuffed Attack Boost Up: Raises MAX BRV„ÄÅ ATK

passives.name: Homerun Swing Extension
passives.desc:
When using Homerun Swing„ÄÅ Homerun Swing+:
 ‚Ä¢ Slight boost to BRV granted based on ATK

When using Homerun Swing:
 ‚Ä¢ BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 ‚Ä¢ Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 ‚Ä¢ Inflicted Stun level +1

When using Homerun Swing+:
 ‚Ä¢ BRV attack hit count becomes 3; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 ‚Ä¢ Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 200%

With active buffs:
 ‚Ä¢ HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (increases BRV based on ATK before HP attack; inflicts 4 turns 1 level of Stun [limit 5])
passives.short_desc: Homerun Swing Extension: Boost to Homerun Swing

passives.short_desc: Destruction Brilliance: Raises ATK„ÄÅ MAX BRV
